entry.title: Issue assets on lightning
entry.summary: The author is seeking information about issuing assets on Lightning Network (LN). They ask if it is currently possible and if so, what the process entails. They also inquire about any ongoing or planned efforts to enable asset issuance on LN. Additionally, the author mentions reading about Omni BOLT as a potential solution, but is uncertain about the project's status. The author then lists three potential use cases for tokens on LN: decentralized exchanges, stablecoins, and liquidity improvement through incentivizing users with native tokens.
